tool.name: OpenNLP Named Entity Recognizer
tool.help:
**What it does**
Generates named entity annotations using the `OpenNLP <https://opennlp.apache.org>`_ named entity recognizer (see the `OpenNLP -- Named Entity Recognition Tutorial <https://www.tutorialspoint.com/opennlp/opennlp_named_entity_recognition.htm>`_ for more information).
**Required annotations**
* `Token <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/Token.html>`_ (LIF)
**Generated Annotations**
A LIF document with a new view containing `NamedEntity <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/NamedEntity.html>`_ annotations, with Person, Location, or Organization as the value of the *category* feature.
